definition: thoroughfare/to go straight ahead/to rush/to clash
(of water) to dash against/to mix with water/to infuse/to rinse/to flush/to develop (a film)/to rise in the air/to clash/to collide with
to nibble away at sth/to eat into/to erode

sentences.english: The bed of a river is partly worn away by corrosive action.
sentences.chinese: 河床部分地就是被这种侵蚀作用冲蚀的。

sentences.english: The erosion resistance of HVOF-sprayed is enhanced with the temperature increasing.
sentences.chinese: 温度升高，涂层的抗冲蚀性能提高。

sentences.english: Long durability thanks to washing and corrosion resistant alloy sphere valve core and stainless valve seat.
sentences.chinese: 合金球面阀芯与不锈钢阀座耐冲蚀，使用寿命长。

sentences.english: The waves are wearing away the rocks.
sentences.chinese: 海浪不停地冲蚀着岩石。

sentences.english: Nonerodible clods are also broken down by impacts of saltating grains.
sentences.chinese: 不可冲蚀的土块因跳跃颗粒的撞击也会破碎。

sentences.english: Erodible soil fractions are usually dislodged from projections and trapped in depression.
sentences.chinese: 可冲蚀土壤部分经常从凸出物剥蚀并降落于洼地。

sentences.english: The effect of impingement angle on the erosion resistance is great.
sentences.chinese: 冲蚀角对涂层抗冲蚀性能有较大影响。

sentences.english: The effect of impingement angle on the erosion resistance is great.
sentences.chinese: 冲蚀角对涂层抗冲蚀性能有较大影响。

sentences.english: Yes, how many years can a mountain exist Before it's washed to the sea ?
sentences.chinese: 一座高山能耸立多少年，直到被冲蚀到海洋？

sentences.english: At the same time, using a new type surface wear resistant coatings, the anti-erosion ability of drill bit is strengthened.
sentences.chinese: 同时采用新型表面防磨涂层，加强了钻头抗冲蚀能力。

sentences.english: The relation between the flow conditions and material surface abrasive erosion of the pump impeller has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了过流条件与泵轮叶片表面冲蚀磨损的关系。

sentences.english: For eons,the pounding waves ate away at the shoreline.
sentences.chinese: 长时期以来波涛汹涌的海浪冲蚀着海岸线。

sentences.english: The running water eroded a gully.
The government has made attempts to reduce soil erosion.
sentences.chinese: 政府已经作出努力来减少土壤冲蚀。

sentences.english: Scientists claim that they will soon be able to create the washout conditions.
sentences.chinese: 科学家们声称，他们很快就能创建冲蚀条件。

sentences.english: The valve seat receives the protection of the spheroid all the time, avoid the eroding of the fluid.
sentences.chinese: 阀座始终受到球体的保护，避免了流体的冲蚀。

definition: to cleanse/to scrub/to scour/to wash down/to erode/to wash away
variant of 岩層|岩层[yan2 ceng2]/rock strata
